body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->
When I run `spack compiler find` it doesn't appear to successfully locate the IBM XL Fortran compilers via the module I have loaded.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ module list
Currently Loaded Modules:
  1) xl/2021.03.11   2) spectrum-mpi/rolling-release   3) cuda/10.1.243   4) StdEnv (S)

  Where:
   S:  Module is Sticky, requires --force to unload or purge
```
```console
$ spack clean --all
$ rm ~/.spack/linux/*
$ git clone git@github.com:spack/spack.git
$ cd spack
$ source ./share/spack/setup-env.sh
```
```console
$ spack compiler find

==> Added 7 new compilers to /g/g12/quellyn/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
    xl_r@16.1  xl@16.1  pgi@20.4  gcc@4.9.3  gcc@4.8.5  clang@11.0.1  clang@6.0.0
==> Compilers are defined in the following files:
    /g/g12/quellyn/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->

When I examine my `~/.spack/compilers.yaml`, I see that `spack` could not find paths to the IBM Fortran compilers:
```console
- compiler:
    spec: xl@16.1
    paths:
      cc: /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2021.03.11/bin/xlc
      cxx: /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2021.03.11/bin/xlC
      f77: null
      fc: null
    flags:
      fflags: -qzerosize
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: ppc64le
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
- compiler:
    spec: xl_r@16.1
    paths:
      cc: /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2021.03.11/bin/xlc_r
      cxx: /usr/tce/packages/xl/xl-2021.03.11/bin/xlC_r
      f77: null
      fc: null
    flags:
      fflags: -qzerosize
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: ppc64le
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
```console
[quellyn@rzansel61:spack]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.2-3693-e5bbb6e5b4
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-power9le
* **Concretizer:** original
```

The above output is from an attempt on the LLNL RZAnsel machine. I have also reproduced this problem on a similar Power9 Linux + IBM XL platform here at LANL (i.e., Darwin).

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
[spack-command-debug-output.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6887731/spack-command-debug-output.txt)

### Additional information

title: `spack compiler find` cannot locate IBM XL Fortran compilers
